title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1500.20 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1500.20 - Application

State Regulations

The requirements of this subpart shall
apply to all attorneys who have been duly admitted to the practice of law in

New York, are not exempt from these requirements pursuant to section
1500.5
(b) of this

Part, and are not newly admitted attorneys subject to the requirements of
subpart B of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1500.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
